Text: Now, just a few months later the plans have come back, the only real change is an adjustment to the cost which has now climbed to a staggering £846,000 for the refurbishment or £141,000 per flat.
Effect: Now, just a few months later the plans have come back, the only real change is an adjustment to the cost which has now climbed to a staggering £846,000
Sentence: <e2>Now, just a few months later the plans have come back, the only real change is an adjustment to the cost which has now climbed to a staggering £846,000</e2> for <e1>the refurbishment or £141,000 per flat.</e1>
